title: Learn about the interpretation of a dead person’s dream of a neighbor giving water to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of the dead giving the living water: It occurs in dreams of gifts and donations that the deceased gives to those he loves in their dreams, and it is one of the most beautiful dreams that the dreamer promised. Interpretation of the dream of the dead giving the neighborhood water by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of the dream of the dead giving water to the living? When the dreamer gets a drink in his sleep Water from the hand of the dead, especially if it is his father, wishes him well and gives him good news that God's blessing will be great upon him. The one who pleases God and avoids what displeases Him. Giving dead water to the living in a dream If he is suffering from poverty or stress, then relief is near, God willing, and he will get rid of his worries and pay his debts, but he must struggle and work to earn according to Sharia law. And staying away from the forbidden path, regardless of the temptations. If the dreamer is suffering from problems and disagreements between him and his partner, then water, when swallowed from the hand of the dead person, indicates that he is on his way to stability and staying away from everything that disturbs his life and causes tension. You are confused and cannot find an explanation that reassures you. ? Search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. What is the interpretation of a dead person’s dream of Ibn Shirin giving water to the neighborhood? Ibn Sirin said that the dreamer in his present life is going through great distress and misguidance, so the dead person came to him to calm him down and give him good news of the goodness that awaits him. But if he is a student of knowledge and feels this disappointment days, and drinking water from the hand of a dead person with a fragrant biography, especially if he was one of the scholars who liberated the dreamer, this means that he will reach a distinguished position in the field of science, but he must be patient and persistent and not back down from the goal he set for himself. If she gives him dates with water, This is a sign of the good news that he will receive soon. Interpretation of a dead man’s dream of giving water in the living to a free man. If the girl suffers from a lack of suitors and suitors and goes through a bad psychological state because of it, then she will soon feel happy and meet the boy of her dreams, whom God will make her her place for patience and calculations. . If she takes him in the water and finds him smiling at her, then she carries kindness and love for people in her heart, and many take her as a good role model for them because of her good manners and behavior. But if he refuses to take her from him, then there is someone who loves her and will save her, but she rejects him and follows her desires to communicate with someone who is not suitable for her. Completely, which will later bring her regret. If her father or mother gives her water in her sleep, this is satisfaction and a prayer for her well-being and peace of mind. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving water to a living person for a married woman. If a married woman is going through a state of sadness and discomfort, she will get rid of this The situation and you feel some happiness in the near future, but you must be brave in the face of difficulties. But if the dead person asks her for water, he needs someone to pray over him and bless his soul. It is good in its purest form for a married woman to get water if she drinks water from the dead person’s hand. If she is suffering from childlessness, she will find in a short time that all the problems of childlessness are gone and that God Almighty has blessed her with a good child. But if she feels psychological fatigue as a result of her husband’s mistreatment, she can be guided by this.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cookies, seeing eating cookies

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream when you see eating biscuits, buying salted sweets with cocoa, chocolate, sweets, sugar or tea for single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorced women? Cookies in a dream Whoever sees that he is eating biscuits is food, and food is either with money or in marriage, and God I know. Eating or baking a cookie indicates ill health and disruption of family peace with ridiculous pretexts. Salted cookies: If you see salted cookies in your dream, this symbolizes honesty, spiritual beliefs and sweet rewards that life has to offer. Perhaps you embrace life and seek to help others. Otherwise, a cookie indicates that you are busy with a complex issue and you are not sure how to deal with it. All sugary foods or dough in a dream are in their interpretation a diet or a legitimate gain, and all baked goods in a dream have a good meaning and a good meaning. Biscuits or cookies in a dream indicate good news, deeds, or sayings. The word “biscuit” comes from Latin, meaning “double baked.” The ingredients used in making cookies also indicate goodness, such as flour, sugar, butter, and water. Cookies Cookies are praiseworthy in the interpretation of dreams because they are a favorite food for a large number of people, especially children who love their crunch. Interpretation of cookies in a dream of one girl or girl. To deduce the meaning of cookies in one dream, it is necessary to return to the interpretation of cookies in a dream, as mentioned in the most famous Books on the interpretation of dreams. Ibn Shaheen says: Cakes in the interpretation are a little money, and perhaps they indicate kindness, grace, and a good reward. As for Al-Nabulsi, he said about the interpretation of cake: It is a journey for the one who loves to eat it in a dream, and it is difficult for the one who hates eating it or devouring it. He also said: Whoever was blessed, the blessing will return to him after it has disappeared. Because the last cakes are like the first. Cookies in one’s dream are closer to the interpretation of cakes, but they are better expressed because they are tastier, better, and easier to eat. Latin “double bread” – as we mentioned above. Interpretation of cookies in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is buying cookies, this interpretation is beneficial to her, God willing. Money is saved because the round cookie trays are very similar to dinars or dirhams in shape, pattern or design. All types of cookies are worthy of praise in the dreams of married women, and such cakes. The more pleasant the taste of a cookie in a dream, the more it expresses good things or happy events. Such cookies made of chocolate, oats, coconut, almonds and other pastries in the interpretation are good as long as they are made of sugar. If a married woman dreams that her husband gives her A piece of biscuit, if you eat it, this is an interpretive profit. Sometimes this scene in dreams indicates the possibility of pregnancy, and sometimes it indicates...

title: Interpretation of a dream about feeding ducks in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to feed ducks in a dream Dreams carry many meanings in reality, so we present below the interpretation of a dream to feed ducks in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream to feed ducks in a dreamInterpretation of a dream to feed ducks in a dream can be a sign that things are becoming easier And God knows best. When a married woman sees feeding ducks in a dream, this could be evidence of kindness, and God knows the unseen. In the case of watching an unmarried girl eating ducks, this could be a sign of goodness and care, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing feeding ducks can also express the good qualities of the dreamer. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about buying ducks in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying ducks in a dream could be a sign of moving to a new home, and God knows the unseen. In the event that an unmarried young man sees himself in a dream buying ducks, this may be an indication of marriage, and God knows best. Likewise, if a girl sees an unmarried The married woman herself in a dream buys ducks, this may be a sign of kindness and marriage, and God knows best. When a married woman sees herself buying ducks in a dream, this may indicate good deeds, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of colored ducks in a dream could be the interpretation of a dream of colored ducks in a dream. A sign of good luck, and God knows best. When a married woman sees colorful ducks in a dream, this may indicate good luck, and God knows the unseen. In the case of seeing a married man buying colored ducks in a dream, this may be evidence of the presence of many offspring, God willing. Also, seeing colored ducks indicates On kindness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ducks hunting in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ducks hunting in a dream can indicate material gains and that God is higher and more knowledgeable. When an unmarried girl sees ducks hunting, this may indicate gains, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen hunting a duck, it may This is a sign of goodness and care, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Seeing duck hunting also represents the achievement of goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing goose eggs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing goose eggs in a dream could be a sign of good things, God willing, and since if the dreamer sees goose eggs, they may be useful to the owner. The dream, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees goose eggs, this may indicate goodness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a married woman sees goose eggs, this may be evidence of the good that she will obtain, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a dead goose in a dreamIt could be the interpretation of a dream about a dead goose in a dream An indication of a cruel woman, and God knows the unseen, since if the dreamer sees a dead goose in a dream, this may be evidence of a cruel-hearted woman, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees a dead goose, it may indicate a stepmother and cruelty, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees the death of a goose It may express his abandonment of his job, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a duck in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman by her lover without marriage

preview.html: Since the dream is the closest thing to reality, and sometimes it is a dream, it was necessary to interpret it to know its meaning, taking into account the face of the beholder and his condition during the vision, in order to learn. More through our translator, follow us. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman being pregnant by her lover without marriage in a dream. Seeing a single woman pregnant by her lover without marriage. It expresses this lover’s control over her thinking and her desire to start a family with him. As well as seeing a lover being pregnant without marriage in a dream. It indicates She is preoccupied with things other than her academic future and must focus. Seeing an unmarried woman getting pregnant by her former lover outside of marriage portends complete comfort after suffering and stability after separation. A girl dreams that she is illegally pregnant by her lover. It is a warning that there is someone He does not deserve to invade her life and harm her. At other times, a dream about pregnancy without marriage is evidence of her success in achieving her ambitions and goals. Seeing her pregnant by her lover without an official relationship foretells that she will marry a man she actually desires. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream marrying her lover without marriage In a dream, it appears that this girl maintains the principles of her religion. Also, seeing her pregnant with two children by her lover in a dream is an indication of the obstacles she faces in consummating her marriage and that she must return to God. See also: Interpretation of dreams for premature birth for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a woman married to her lover. Without marriage in a dream: If a married woman dreams that she is pregnant without marrying her ex-lover in a dream. This indicates her lack of confidence in her current life and her desire for divorce. Seeing a pregnant woman without marriage in a dream is a sign of the news that she hears, which will be the reason for her happiness. Likewise, a married woman dreams of becoming pregnant without a legal contract from her lover. It indicates what she is going through during this period of fighting over the inheritance with a member of her family. On the other hand, if she sees that she is conducting an analysis, and pregnancy appears in her, it will give her good news about the things that will bring Her happiness and joy. And seeing a married woman dreaming of getting pregnant from her lover without marriage. It shows a difficult situation that you are exposed to, but you quickly overcome it with God’s help and grace. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman dreaming of getting pregnant from her lover without marriage in a dream. When a divorced woman sees pregnancy from her former lover in a dream without marriage It is a sign of happy developments that are happening in her life and this will compensate her for what she went through. Seeing that she is pregnant by her ex-husband in a dream, this is a sign that stability will return to their lives again. Seeing pregnancy in a divorced woman’s dream could be a sign of new things penetrating her life. Her life. And seeing the dream of separating with pregnancy from her beloved without marriage in her dream. She expresses her struggle with her divorce, but it is about to end, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dream of pregnancy for a man by a lover without marriage in a dream and its meaning. Seeing a man seeing the pregnancy of his beloved In a dream without marriage, it indicates a happy event happening in his life

title: Interpretation of the forty-fourth mother in a dream

preview.html:
Today we presented to you the interpretation of a forty-four in a dream in different cases. They are among the poisonous insects, but their poison is weak and they do not cause great harm to a person if they bite him. But what is the meaning of that if you see a forty-four in a dream? What are the circumstances under which he sees it? What is the interpretation of these terms? This is what we will try to discover through this article from the encyclopedia.Interpretation of a forty-four-year-old mother in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a forty-four single motherIf an unmarried girl sees a mother of forty-four children in a dream, this means the presence of people who envy her and wish that goodness would go to her, and it is a sign for her that she must She protects herself with memories, by reading the Qur’an. “Through worship. And if she sees that she is killing this insect, it is good that she will get rid of the worries and problems that surround it. Among the visions that carry a warning for the pioneer. For a girl to see that a mother of forty-four children is wearing her clothes, this means that she is surrounded by bad friends and people who do not love her well. Interpretation of seeing a mother of forty-four children in a dream about a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees a mother of forty-four children in a dream indicates that she will face problems and difficulties in her pregnancy . It also indicates the presence of envy around her. She must protect herself and her child by constantly remembering, praying, and reciting the Holy Qur’an. And if she sees that she can get rid of them, then may God Almighty grant her that the cunning of schemers or the envy of envious people will not find her, because she will get rid of her worries and problems.
ZOE.Interpretation of a dream about forty-four women for a married woman: For a married woman to see a mother of forty-four children in her home is evidence that there are women who interfere in the affairs of her home and her private secrets, who hate her and envy her, and her home has been infected with envy. As a result of the lack of worship and remembrance of God, she also maintains her prayers and acts of worship and always reads the Qur’an at home to preserve and protect her in her home. It is said that seeing a married woman and the mother of forty-four children in her dream indicates that there are serious differences between her and her husband, and they must work to solve these problems and preserve Their house and not seeking to demolish it. . Haters and envious people want to do this. The bite of a forty-four-year-old mother in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that a forty-four-year-old mother bites him and cannot get rid of it, this is a warning to him that there is one of his relatives who wants to harm him, and will really harm him. The bite of a forty-four-year-old mother indicates a son On the presence of a jealous woman who deceives the priest and wishes for the death of his blessings. Interpretation of a dream about a mother’s forty-four white eggs. Whoever sees in his dream an insect or forty-four white colors, this indicates that the person close to him wants evil and is working to harm him, but he does not know it and it is a sign of caring for him. The people close to him are truly trustworthy.Mother of Forty-Four KilledAll that is predicted when you see a mother of forty-four is that he will kill her. In detail as follows: Whoever sees that he is chasing a forty-four-year-old mother to kill her, and he has already killed her, this is good for the pioneer because he is trying hard and doing everything he can to get rid of

And if our feeling of protection really gives us confidence and security, then what about seeing someone protecting you in a dream, what is its interpretation and what does it show in real life for individuals, then this is what we will learn in the next article from the Encyclopedia. Interpretation of someone protecting me in a dream. Seeing someone receiving protection in A dream means that he is a person who feels helpless in a situation. The harsh situations in life have made him a dependent person who is not good at handling all situations, so he needs to start learning how to do so. To deal with different situations. In the event that you see the opposite that you are the person who protects others from any harm in the dream, then your vision expresses the emotional and psychological barriers that you place between you and others, believing that you are protecting yourself from deception, but you need to know exactly what can be hidden and what can be revealed. About him from your personal aspects to people. Protection usually symbolizes the dreamer's ability to overcome bad situations and events that he may experience in his life in the coming period, and if one sees in his dream that his enemy cannot harm him, then his vision shows the ability to secure his life. He defends himself well. From a moral point of view, this vision symbolizes that the viewer will have a great ability to deal with others and that his financial situation will improve in the coming period much more than before. Protection in the Islamic sense indicates that the Messenger will do many good deeds. So God strengthens him by protecting him in days of distress, and gives him a loyal friend who will be his supporter in life and support him in times of adversity. Seeing someone protecting you in a dream. Seeing insurance or police protection indicates that the dreamer has committed some sins and disobedience in his life, so he will face some disturbances and crises in his life. His life. Whoever sees that he does not feel safe in his life, his vision shows that he will make a series of positive, radical changes in his life, until he succeeds and achieves his desires in life. From an incurable disease that causes him fatigue and anxiety throughout his life. Seeing that he is under the protection of another person indicates that the dreamer fled and hid from his presence, appeared in difficult situations and felt great reluctance to seek help from one of his close friends or relatives. Seeing protection often symbolizes the presence of some Secrets and secrets in his life, which he seeks to hide from everyone, but they can cause him many crises and conflicts in the future. Protection in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s need to feel family warmth and reassurance and the feelings of sympathy and affection that a person feels with those around him. This vision can indicate On the emergence of many positive events and situations in the life of the dreamer, which will be a strong reason to change his life completely, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about a knife by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a knife and a knife. The interpretation of a dream about a knife and a knife varies depending on the knife directed, whether it is in the back, the heart, or elsewhere, as the interpretation varies from woman to man and from a single woman to a married woman. The vision differs from one person to another. Interpretation of a dream about a knife by Ibn Sirin. The famous scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted that the vision A knife in a dream is a sign of kindness and abundant sustenance for the dreamer in his next life. If an unmarried young man sees a knife in a dream, this indicates the imminent date of his engagement and marriage. If a married man sees a knife in his wife’s hand in a dream, this indicates that he presented her with a male child. However, if the husband is the one holding the knife in his hand, this indicates that. A female offered it. Seeing a knife for a sick person in a dream is a sign that he will recover soon and his sadness will go away. If a man sees himself carrying a knife or buying it in a dream, it means that he will become a leader or obtain a high position in the future. In case someone sees him cutting food with a knife in In a dream, this indicates the loss of an important person or something that has great importance in his life. If a married man sees in a dream that he swallowed a knife, this means that one of his children supports him and guarantees him financially. If the dreamer sees the knife in a dream and cuts his hand, this means that he will face... Many challenges in the coming period.Interpretation of a dream about a knife by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a knife and a knife. Interpretation of a dream about a knife and a knife. For visions of good and evil, we will learn about them through the site. Various through the following points. A good vision on appeal. Interpretation of a dream about a knife and a knife. For another person with a knife in a dream, this indicates that this person He seeks to reach a specific goal in his life and get rid of his competitors. In the event that the dreamer is worried and dreams that he is killing another person in a dream with a knife, this means that the dreamer will get rid of the sadness and worries that afflict him in the coming period. When a person dreams of killing someone with a knife, it is considered This person is his enemy in reality, so this indicates getting rid of this enmity and the emergence of peace between them. If a person who is looking for a halal job to earn money sees that he is hitting something harmful with a knife in a dream, this indicates that he will get a halal job and a high salary. In the event that the dreamer He suffers from some diseases or problems in his life, and seeing him kill someone with a knife, this indicates that he has gotten rid of that disease or problems in his life. Bad visions of stabbing. If the dreamer sees someone close to him in a dream trying to stab him, this indicates a disaster or conspiracy that the dreamer will fall into and must Be careful. If the dreamer sees the knife of someone he does not know and notices blood on the knife, this means that the dreamer is going through a phase full of difficulties and difficult decisions that must be made. If someone sees his close friend stabbing him with a knife in a dream, this means that this friend is betraying the dreamer and stabbing him in the back in the Reality. If the dreamer sees one of his relatives stabbed with a knife, this indicates the presence of problems between family members. In the case where we see a group of people stabbing each other, this indicates

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a man other than my husband having intercourse with me according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html:
Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried man from me can confuse any woman, because it is a great sin in reality, but you should not feel any fear from this dream. We must pay attention to them, and all of this has been explained to us by our esteemed scholars in our article. Interpretation of the dream of a man having sex with me other than my husband. What is the interpretation of the dream of a man having sex with me other than my husband? Seeing this dream is a sign of the tremendous good that awaits her in reality, and it is not A bad sign at all. The vision is also good news for achieving what you aspire to, especially if this man is of high status, so her vision shows the happiness and contentment that she sees in her life. If this man is wealthy, this indicates that he has a lot of money that is not decreasing Never and that her life is free of financial crises. If a woman associates with him in the market, this leads to revealing a secret that she hid in the past, so she should be more careful and not afraid of anything. If the association is with a relative, this may indicate the happiness that awaits her In her next life, a strong family relationship and the high position she occupies in life. If she practices animals in a dream, this portends her victory over any enemy that stands in her way and she will not be harmed no matter what happens, so she will pass her trials well without any fatigue or boredom. If the person seeing the vision is a divorced woman, this foretells that she will return to her ex-husband or enter into a new life to compensate for her previous life. Also, her vision is a sign of stability and calm in the next stage of her life.
ZOE. What is the interpretation of a dream about a man other than my husband having intercourse with me according to Ibn Sirin? Our greatest imam, Ibn Sirin, explained to us that this dream is an expression of the tremendous goodness that awaits her in her life from her husband and children. Perhaps the dream indicates the lack of cohesion and love between her and her husband and that she must She looks at her life and tries to solve the problems she is going through so that this situation does not get worse. The vision may lead to her always feeling sad as a result of her husband’s neglect, as she misses his love and affection for her, but she must try to get close to him and understand him so that she can live her life happily. In the coming days. The vision also leads to mistreatment between her and her husband, which makes her always think about it. She sees him in her dream, but she does not have to, so she has to start with good treatment until she finds good treatment in return. Because of her behavior towards her husband, she feels very happy and stable in her life. Seeing intercourse in a dream may indicate getting rid of a major problem that she faced in her life in the previous period, and this makes her live comfortably, so she must be close to the Lord of the Worlds to get rid of all problems. Which deals with. We find that the appearance of a woman in this dream and she is happy is a sign that all the dreams that she believes will come true. As for her sadness, this leads to family quarrels that frustrate her and help her, but all of this must move to negative feelings so that she can stand up again. We find that anal intercourse leads to multiple sins in her life, which puts her in constant trouble, but if he is able

title: Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Buruj in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Surat Al-Buruj in a dream is one of the most beautiful dreams that brings great happiness to the dreamer when he sees it, as Surat Al-Buruj is one of the beautiful Qur’anic surahs that has many meanings and is important for all people in the audience. Life and seeing it in our dreams is important evidence of success and excellence in public life and getting rid of the world and everything that angers God Almighty, and seeing it in a dream means success and great happiness. Ibn Sirin explained different interpretations of seeing Surat Al-Buruj in a dream, which carries for us many important meanings and interpretations that we must consider. The dreamer should know it correctly. Interpretation of Surah Al-Buruj in a dream. Reading the skill of horoscopes shows rising assumptions and increasing knowledge and learning. It indicates that you are thinking about big issues, solving them and achieving them. Hearing Surah Al-Buruj in a dream is a relief from worries. It is said: Whoever sees Surah Al-Buruj in his dream witnessed testimony but did not see anything of it (see And he did not see anything). Seeing Surat Al-Buruj in a dream is largely evidence of strength and unity in public life. Seeing Surat Al-Buruj in a dream indicates positive changes in life. Seeing Surat Al-Buruj on the Night of Destiny is evidence of closeness to God Almighty. Surah Al-Buruj in a dream Evidence of goodness and great happiness in public life. Interpretation of Surah Al-Buruj in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees Surah Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence that goodness is imminent for her. Single women who see Surah Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of a close marriage with a good man with good morals. Hearing Surah Al-Buruj in a dream. The zodiac sign in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of kindness and important and new changes in public life. Reciting Surah Al-Azab in a girl’s dream is evidence of happiness and great psychological comfort. Also, reciting Surat Al-Buruj in a dream indicates closeness to God Almighty. An unmarried woman reading Surah Al-Buruj in The dream is evidence that her life is full of calm and closeness to God Almighty. Also, reading Surat Al-Buruj in a dream indicates her health in public life. Interpretation of Surat Al-Buruj in a dream for a married woman: A married woman seeing Surat Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of excellence and great success in public life. Reading A married woman reciting Surat Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of happiness and contentment. A married woman who recites Surat Al-Buruj in her home is evidence of great stability in her marital life. A wife seeing Surat Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of his wife’s justice and morals in an excellent way. Interpretation of Surat Al-Buruj in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman with Surat Al-Buruj In a dream, it is evidence of her good morals in life. A pregnant woman reading Surah Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of an easy and good birth in the near future. Surah Al-Buruj in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the birth of a child loyal to her and his father in life. Surah Al-Buruj in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the necessity of Confirmation in public life. Also, Surah Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of complete sincerity in life. Surah Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of the abundance of goodness for the dreamer.

A wife seeing Surat Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of his wife’s justice and morals in an excellent way. Interpretation of Surat Al-Buruj in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman with Surat Al-Buruj In a dream, it is evidence of her good morals in life. A pregnant woman reading Surah Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of an easy and good birth in the near future. Surah Al-Buruj in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the birth of a child loyal to her and his father in life. Surah Al-Buruj in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the necessity of Confirmation in public life. Also, Surah Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of complete sincerity in life. Surah Al-Buruj in a dream is evidence of the abundance of goodness for the dreamer.
